definition: to confer/to grant/to bestow a title/to seal/classifier for sealed objects, esp. letters

to cover/to encase/cover/sheath/to overlap/to interleave/to model after/to copy/formula/harness/loop of rope/(fig.) to fish for/to obtain slyly/classifier for sets, collections/bend (of a river or mountain range, in place names)/tau (Greek letter Ττ)

sentences.english: Create your own CD covers, inserts, and labels.
sentences.chinese: 制作自己的唱片封套，插页和标记。

sentences.english: Please mark the envelope with the title of your film.
sentences.chinese: 请在封套上注名你的影片的名称。

sentences.english: Lyman tore the cover from the top of the package .
sentences.chinese: 莱门把那包东西顶上的封套撕开。

sentences.english: This test ensures that the enclosure will not react chemically with your photos.
sentences.chinese: 摄影活性测试能确保封套不与您的照片发生化学反应。

sentences.english: XingFeng KK dissatisfaction the new album covers, and must honor follow up.
sentences.chinese: KK不满新人邢丰的唱片封套，又要荣跟进。

sentences.english: You should rip the cover off the box first.
sentences.chinese: 你首先应当把这个盒子的封套扯掉。

definition: dust jacket (of a book)/protective cover/document seal
the back cover of a book
